main event: A ball-shaped object with a fiery-red ring was observed in Hellenburg, Germany on 12 January 1957.
interesting points: The object was intense black in color.,The sighting lasted for about 4-5 seconds.,The object was observed descending and then ascending.,There were two objects reported.,The observers suggested there may be further insights in Dr. Hynek's reports.
sighted object: a ball-shaped object with a fiery-red ring
